short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts recipe details from cluttered recipe pages and shows them in a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever looked for a recipe, but found the page is littered with ads and unnecessary noise? Recipe Extractor removes all that noise and summarises the information for you. 

We'll give you the name, the ingredients, the method and the nutritional info in a simple easy-to-digest format. 

Our v1 allows you to copy and paste the recipe info so you can store it elsewhere. 

Coming soon, our v2 will allow you to save these recipes to you own profile to create your own bespoke recipe library.
